original: @206a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @206a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: si t'a ta pa tre aa pa r'a ji ta n'a ma manda la s'a dha nam /
analyzed: si t'a ta pa tre aa pa r'a ji ta n'a ma manda la s'a dha nam /
translated: Sita-pattra-apara-jit-nama-mandala-sadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The mandala sādhana called “The White Parasol Invincible”

original: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble White Parasol!

original: yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa //
translated: The basis of all good qualities,

original: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor las byung ba //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the crown of the Victorious Ones,

original: sprul pa'i rang bzhin lha mo ni //
analyzed: sprul pa'i rang bzhin lha mo ni //
translated: The goddess whose nature is emanation,

original: sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra //
analyzed: sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra //
translated: Her color like a snow mountain at sunrise,

original: phyag stong spyan stong brgya phrag stong //
analyzed: phyag stong spyan stong brgya phrag stong //
translated: With a thousand arms, a thousand eyes, a thousand heads,

original: lha rdzas gos kyis yang dag brgyan //
analyzed: lha rdzas gos kyis yang dag brgyan //
translated: Adorned with divine garments,

original: bkra shis che ba'i lha mo la //
analyzed: bkra shis che ba'i lha mo la //
translated: To the goddess of great auspiciousness,

original: de la bstod de sgrub thabs bri //
analyzed: de la bstod de sgrub thabs bri //
translated: I praise her and write the sādhana.

original: kun la phan gdags rim pa yis //
analyzed: kun la phan gdags rim pa yis //
translated: In order to benefit all,

original: gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis las //
analyzed: gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis las //
translated: From the two mandalas of White Parasol,

original: yid kyi rnam pa bkod pa yis //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam pa bkod pa yis //
translated: Arranged with the mind,

original: bshad kyis nyon mongs ma dad min //
analyzed: bshad kyis nyon mongs ma dad min //
translated: Listen without distraction or agitation.

original: yid dga' ba yi gnas ngag tu //
analyzed: yid dga' ba yi gnas ngag tu //
translated: In a place that delights the mind,

original: sgrub po dam tshig grogs bcas kyis //
analyzed: sgrub po dam tshig grogs bcas kyis //
translated: The adept and his companions,🔽having set up the mandala in that place,

original: sa phyogs der ni bsham pa dang // bsag pa bum pa lnga sogs pa //
analyzed: sa phyogs der ni bsham pa dang // bsag pa bum pa lnga sogs pa //
translated: should gather the five vases and so forth,🔽in accordance with their ability.

original: nus dang sbyar yin de las gzhan //
analyzed: nus dang sbyar yin de las gzhan //
translated: Other than that,

original: rigs dang mi rigs tshogs par bya //
analyzed: rigs dang mi rigs tshogs par bya //
translated: they should gather what is suitable and unsuitable.

original: snying rje chen po rab dmigs pas //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rab dmigs pas //
translated: Having thoroughly visualized great compassion,

original: sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis //
analyzed: sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis //
translated: and having previously generated the mind,

original: skad cig sku yis phyogs dang mtshams //
analyzed: skad cig sku yis phyogs dang mtshams //
translated: in an instant, with the body,

original: bsrung dang sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: bsrung dang sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
translated: one should guard the directions and quarters with mantra and mudra.

original: snying gar zla steng yi ge yi //
analyzed: snying gar zla steng yi ge yi //
translated: On the moon at the heart, the syllable

original: 'od kyis drang dang sprul nas ni //
analyzed: 'od kyis drang dang sprul nas ni //
translated: draws in light and emanates it,🔽having completed the accumulation of merit,

original: bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs pa dang // snyan tshig ngag gis bstod pa dang // phyag 'tshal sngon du song ba yis //
analyzed: bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs pa dang // snyan tshig ngag gis bstod pa dang // phyag 'tshal sngon du song ba yis //
translated: having praised with melodious speech, and having gone before with prostrations,

original: sems bskyed sdom pa gzung dbang bskur //
analyzed: sems bskyed sdom pa gzung dbang bskur //
translated: one should generate the mind and take the vow.🔽Having conferred empowerment,

original: lha rnams bsdus pas lus bsregs te //
analyzed: lha rnams bsdus pas lus bsregs te //
translated: the deities are gathered and the body is burned,

original: rang bzhin lus su blta bar bya //
analyzed: rang bzhin lus su blta bar bya //
translated: and one should see the natural body.

original: gnas sdu aom bsam 'gro ba sbyang //
analyzed: gnas sdu aom bsam 'gro ba sbyang //
translated: The place is purified with oṃ.

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo ma lus rdzogs par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo ma lus rdzogs par bya //
translated: one should complete all the wheels.

original: dkar mo chen mo phyag stong ma //
analyzed: dkar mo chen mo phyag stong ma //
translated: The great white one has a thousand hands,

original: dbu stong spyan grangs brgya phrag stong //
analyzed: dbu stong spyan grangs brgya phrag stong //
translated: a thousand heads, and a hundred eyes.

original: lha yi rgyan dang chas rdzogs pa //
analyzed: lha yi rgyan dang chas rdzogs pa //
translated: Having perfected the ornaments and attire of the gods,

original: bkra shis che ba'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: bkra shis che ba'i lha mo'o //
translated: she is the greatly auspicious goddess.

original: phyogs ni shar lho nub byang du //
analyzed: phyogs ni shar lho nub byang du //
translated: In the east, south, west, and north,

original: drag shul chen mo rab gtum mo //
analyzed: drag shul chen mo rab gtum mo //
translated: the greatly wrathful one, the very fierce one,

original: 'bar ba chen mo stobs chen mo //
analyzed: 'bar ba chen mo stobs chen mo //
translated: the greatly blazing one, the greatly powerful one,

original: blta dkar sems dang dmar ljang ma //🔽g-yas g-yon mthun par phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: blta dkar sems dang dmar ljang ma // g-yas g-yon mthun par phyag rgya ni //
translated: the white-eyed one, the red-minded one, and the green one.🔽The mudras on the right and left are🔽the vajra fist resting on the hip,

original: rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten dang // bum pa bzung bas 'gying ba yi //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten dang // bum pa bzung bas 'gying ba yi //
translated: and the proud one holding a vase.

original: nyi zla'i gdan bzhugs bsam par bya //
analyzed: nyi zla'i gdan bzhugs bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine them seated on sun and moon seats.

original: @206b de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la //
analyzed: @206b de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la //
translated: In the maṇḍala wheel of that,

original: shar phyogs 'khor lo rnam bzhi la //
analyzed: shar phyogs 'khor lo rnam bzhi la //
translated: in the east, on the four wheels,

original: gos dkar mo dang khro gnyer can //
analyzed: gos dkar mo dang khro gnyer can //
translated: Pāṇḍaravāsinī, Bhṛkuṭī,

original: phreng ba'i padma rdo rje ma //🔽sor mo phreng ba autpa la'o //
analyzed: phreng ba'i padma rdo rje ma // sor mo phreng ba autpa la'o //
translated: Mālā, Padmā, and Vajrī,🔽Aṅkuśī, Puṣpā, Dhūpā, Ālokā,

original: sngo bsangs ljang gu dmar mo'o //
analyzed: sngo bsangs ljang gu dmar mo'o //
translated: Gandhā, and Veṇu are blue, green, and red.

original: lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo rin //
analyzed: lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo rin //
translated: The precious wheel in the southern direction

original: gzhan gyis mi thub sgrog can mo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub sgrog can mo //
translated: is Aśokakāntā.

original: mchod mo gzi brjid chan mo ni //
analyzed: mchod mo gzi brjid chan mo ni //
translated: The glorious one is

original: dkar dang ser nag ljang gu ma //🔽rdo rje rin chen dbyug pa ste //
analyzed: dkar dang ser nag ljang gu ma // rdo rje rin chen dbyug pa ste //
translated: white, yellow, dark blue, and green.🔽The vajra, jewel, and club

original: spos dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
analyzed: spos dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
translated: are incense and the vajra chain.

original: nub tu stobs chen lu gu rgyud //
analyzed: nub tu stobs chen lu gu rgyud //
translated: In the west is the powerful chain,

original: rdo rje rig 'dzin rigs gser phreng //
analyzed: rdo rje rig 'dzin rigs gser phreng //
translated: the vajra vidyādhara, and the golden rosary family.

original: dmar dang ser dang dkar ljang ma //
analyzed: dmar dang ser dang dkar ljang ma //
translated: They are red, yellow, white, and green.

original: rdo rje dang ni bgrang phreng bsnams //
analyzed: rdo rje dang ni bgrang phreng bsnams //
translated: They hold a vajra and a rosary.

original: byang du rdo rje rin chen ma //
analyzed: byang du rdo rje rin chen ma //
translated: In the north is Vajraratnā,

original: gtsug tor bsgyings ma gser can ma //
analyzed: gtsug tor bsgyings ma gser can ma //
translated: Uṣṇīṣavijayā, and Kanakā.

original: dmar po dkar dang ljang gu ser //
analyzed: dmar po dkar dang ljang gu ser //
translated: They are red, white, green, and yellow.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje bgrang phreng can //🔽sgrol ma dkar mo nam mkha' la //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje bgrang phreng can // sgrol ma dkar mo nam mkha' la //
translated: They hold a vajra cross and a rosary.🔽Imagine white Tārā

original: bsgyings pa skyabs sbyin bsam par bya //
analyzed: bsgyings pa skyabs sbyin bsam par bya //
translated: in the sky, with her gaze extended, and granting protection.

original: padma'i spyan ni 'og tu bsam //
analyzed: padma'i spyan ni 'og tu bsam //
translated: Imagine Padma-netra below her,

original: dkar mo rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
analyzed: dkar mo rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
translated: white, in vajra posture.

original: lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang //
translated: All of these goddesses

original: yid tsam khros nas gco la gzigs //
analyzed: yid tsam khros nas gco la gzigs //
translated: are slightly wrathful, looking at Caṇḍa.

original: sgo ma mtshams kyi lha mo ni //
analyzed: sgo ma mtshams kyi lha mo ni //
translated: The door goddesses are at the corners.

original: dkyil 'khor kun nas rab tu gsal //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun nas rab tu gsal //
translated: They illuminate the entire maṇḍala.

original: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang // me yi mtshams su gnas par bya //🔽thams cad pa ni rdzogs pa ru //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang // me yi mtshams su gnas par bya // thams cad pa ni rdzogs pa ru //
translated: They should be placed in the east and so forth, and in the southeast and so forth.

original: blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya //
translated: The wise one should meditate on the complete🔽form of the principal goddess.

original: gtso mo'i thugs kar sa bon las //
analyzed: gtso mo'i thugs kar sa bon las //
translated: From the seed syllable in the heart of the principal goddess,

original: de lta bu nyid bskyed pa yi //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid bskyed pa yi //
translated: one should generate the same

original: sa bon 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyang //
analyzed: sa bon 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyang //
translated: form, purifying migrators with light from the seed syllable.🔽Having made offerings to the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang // mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin bya //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang // mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin bya //
translated: one should complete all activities.

original: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
translated: Having invited the awareness beings,

original: mnyes dang tha dad med par bya //
analyzed: mnyes dang tha dad med par bya //
translated: they should be made inseparable from the pleasing forms.

original: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs te//
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs te//
translated: Having blessed with the three syllables,

original: ma 'dres rab gsal bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ma 'dres rab gsal bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the clear forms.🔽Having made offerings of alcohol to the principal goddess

original: gtso mo chang gis mchod pa dang // phyag sogs rdzogs nas bya ba ni //
analyzed: gtso mo chang gis mchod pa dang // phyag sogs rdzogs nas bya ba ni //
translated: and having completed the prostrations and so forth,

original: 'dod pa kun la sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun la sbyar bar bya //
translated: one should apply oneself to all desires.

original: gal te slob mar dbang bskur na //
analyzed: gal te slob mar dbang bskur na //
translated: If one is to confer empowerment on a disciple,

original: sngon bzhin du ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sngon bzhin du ni bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate as before.

original: bum pa sbyang byas zla la aom //
analyzed: bum pa sbyang byas zla la aom //
translated: The vase is purified, and the moon is in the vase.

original: spro bsdu lha mo bskyed pa dang // dgug pa byas nas mchod sogs bya //
analyzed: spro bsdu lha mo bskyed pa dang // dgug pa byas nas mchod sogs bya //
translated: One should emanate and gather the goddesses, summon them, and make offerings, and so forth.

original: de nas legs ldan mchod pa dang // bsgo dang las bcol de nas ni //
analyzed: de nas legs ldan mchod pa dang // bsgo dang las bcol de nas ni //
translated: Then, having made offerings to the excellent one, one should give instructions and assign tasks.

original: sngon du lung de bklag par bya //
analyzed: sngon du lung de bklag par bya //
translated: Then, one should recite that scripture beforehand.

original: bdun nam 'bum mam grangs med pa'o //
analyzed: bdun nam 'bum mam grangs med pa'o //
translated: It is either seven, one hundred thousand, or countless.

original: legs ldan gzungs kyis bstod pa dang // mchod pas bsgo ba thams cad byed //
analyzed: legs ldan gzungs kyis bstod pa dang // mchod pas bsgo ba thams cad byed //
translated: One should do all the instructions with the praise of the excellent dhāraṇī and offerings.

original: lha mo 'od zhu bdud @207a * //
analyzed: lha mo 'od zhu bdud @207a * //
translated: The goddess melts with light, and with the elixir

original: rtsi yis // khrus dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsi yis // khrus dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o //
translated: one should bathe and recite the benediction.

original: dbus bzhag phyogs rnams bcing ba dang // skud pa lnga yi dra ba yis //
analyzed: dbus bzhag phyogs rnams bcing ba dang // skud pa lnga yi dra ba yis //
translated: Placing in the center, binding the directions, and with the net of five strings,

original: tshon gyis bcad de dkri ba dang // rus pa'am bong brdo ba la //
analyzed: tshon gyis bcad de dkri ba dang // rus pa'am bong brdo ba la //
translated: one should cut with the colors, wrap, and grind the bone or clay.

original: dkris nas gtor te byur bsal bya //
analyzed: dkris nas gtor te byur bsal bya //
translated: Having wrapped, one should scatter and remove the obstacles.

original: de nas gtor ma byas nas ni //🔽bsrung ba lus sam mgul du gdags //
analyzed: de nas gtor ma byas nas ni // bsrung ba lus sam mgul du gdags //
translated: Then, having made the bali offering,🔽one should place the protection on the body or neck.

original: bcings pa lus la dkri ba dang // phur bu bton nas gdab par bya //
analyzed: bcings pa lus la dkri ba dang // phur bu bton nas gdab par bya //
translated: Having bound, one should wrap on the body, and having extracted the kīlas, one should cast them.

original: gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la //
analyzed: gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la //
translated: On birch bark, cloth, or a tree bark,

original: gur kum dri zhim 'um bu yis //
analyzed: gur kum dri zhim 'um bu yis //
translated: With saffron and fragrant ink,

original: skar ma rgyal la bab pa na //
analyzed: skar ma rgyal la bab pa na //
translated: When the star Puṣya is ascendant,

original: sngags pas bri ba rdzogs nas ni //
analyzed: sngags pas bri ba rdzogs nas ni //
translated: The mantra practitioner, having completed the writing,

original: btags pa tsam gyis bshad pa yi//
analyzed: btags pa tsam gyis bshad pa yi//
translated: By merely tying it, explains

original: gnod pa ma lus pa las thar //
analyzed: gnod pa ma lus pa las thar //
translated: The complete liberation from all harm.

original: dad ldan 'di ru dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: dad ldan 'di ru dbang bskur ba //
translated: Here, the one with faith, having been initiated,

original: bu 'dod yi dam bcas tsam gyis //
analyzed: bu 'dod yi dam bcas tsam gyis //
translated: By merely making a commitment to desire a son,

original: rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams 'phel //
analyzed: rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams 'phel //
translated: Obtains it, and their lifespan and merit increase.

original: bde ba can du nye bar 'gro //
analyzed: bde ba can du nye bar 'gro //
translated: They approach Sukhāvatī.

original: rgyal la bri ba rdzogs nas ni //
analyzed: rgyal la bri ba rdzogs nas ni //
translated: Having completed the writing under Puṣya,

original: rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas ni //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas ni //
translated: Having tied it to the top of a victory banner,

original: rim gro chen po btsugs byas nas //
analyzed: rim gro chen po btsugs byas nas //
translated: Having established great service,

original: mi nad la sogs zlog par byed //
analyzed: mi nad la sogs zlog par byed //
translated: They avert human illness and so forth.

original: de ni char 'bab nad med pa //
analyzed: de ni char 'bab nad med pa //
translated: Then, with rain falling and no illness,

original: klu rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlob //
analyzed: klu rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlob //
translated: The nāgas bless it.

original: 'di dag bya ba kun la ni //
analyzed: 'di dag bya ba kun la ni //
translated: For all these activities,

original: mchod dang gtor mas legs ldan mchod //
analyzed: mchod dang gtor mas legs ldan mchod //
translated: One should worship Subhadra with offerings and bali.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa dang // dge bas sku gnyis rdzogs par shog / bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i rim pa /
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa dang // dge bas sku gnyis rdzogs par shog / bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i rim pa /
translated: The ritual procedure of the Blessed One, the White Parasol Arisen from the Uṣṇīṣa,

original: slob dpon ghi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ghi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: composed by Master Gṛhīva, is complete.
